note.p: References: P Fontes da Costa, 'The Culture of Curiosity at The Royal Society in the first half of the eighteenth century', NR 2002 vo l56 pp 147-166

Notes: Main source quoted by BR index is Genealogies of Rhode Island families (1983, v.2). Walker died at Narragansett, Rhode Island (source; register of St Paul's Church, N., quoted in 1983 above, v.2, 272-273)
